fields.name: LaurenNotFoundText
fields.fieldText: Hello! You are running this flow as the admin user and we were unable to find the community user named Lauren Bailey or the community user with the external id of Contact.001. Please modify this flow to enter the correct search criteria for your desired community user. You can find the criteria in the Get Records step named "find Lauren by Name. Thank you.
